name: Orrstown Financial Services, Inc.
description: Orrstown Financial Services, Inc. is a community-focused financial institution serving the banking needs of individuals and businesses in Pennsylvania and surrounding areas. Founded in 1919, Orrstown has built a strong reputation for providing personalized banking solutions tailored to the needs of its customers. The company operates through its subsidiary, Orrstown Bank, which offers a wide range of banking services including personal and business checking accounts, savings accounts, loans, mortgages, and wealth management services. With a commitment to customer service and community engagement, Orrstown focuses on fostering long-term relationships with its clients while supporting local initiatives and organizations. The bank utilizes modern technology to enhance customer experience, providing convenient online and mobile banking options. Orrstown Financial Services aims to sustain growth while remaining dedicated to the communities it serves, ensuring that its banking services are accessible and beneficial to all customers.

seo.meta_title: Orrstown Financial Services, Inc. | Community Banking Solutions
seo.meta_description: Discover Orrstown Financial Services, Inc., a community-focused bank offering personalized banking solutions for individuals and businesses. Explore our services and commitment to local communities.

faq.question: What services does Orrstown Bank offer?
faq.answer: Orrstown Bank offers personal banking, business banking, and wealth management services.

faq.question: Where is Orrstown Financial Services headquartered?
faq.answer: Orrstown Financial Services is headquartered in Shippensburg, Pennsylvania, USA.

faq.question: When was Orrstown Financial Services founded?
faq.answer: Orrstown Financial Services was founded in 1919.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Orrstown Financial Services?
faq.answer: Thomas R. W. Wylie is the CEO of Orrstown Financial Services, Inc.
